0871A46B.Toast: Uncover the dark secret of the Downs.

B12EDDB8.Phase21Description: Una, one of the Downs farmers, found a druidic totem and somehow activated it. I fought the remains of her husband Lorcan at their farm.

B87761DE.Phase18Description: I've learned that farmers in the Downs have been hearing a strange calling. Those who heed the call become werewolves and lose their humanity. Druid Artair would like help discovering where the call originated from.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: I've learned that farmers in the Downs have been hearing a strange calling. Those who heed the call become werewolves and lose their humanity. Druid Artair would like help discovering where the call originated from.
